sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Strip Packing Machine for packaging tablets/capsules between two layers of foil.
sections.scope: Applicable to packaging activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Check cleanliness of sealing rollers, feeding tracks, and cutters.
Load foil rolls and thread them through the sealing rollers.
Set the sealing temperature and start the heating elements.
Once temperature is reached, perform a test run with empty foil.
Load products into the hopper and start the feeding mechanism.
Verify sealing quality, pocket formation, and cut accuracy.
Check batch coding and printing clarity.
Collect finished strips and perform leak tests.
Stop the machine and clean all contact parts after use.
Document machine settings and yield in the batch record.
precautions: Do not touch heated sealing rollers during operation.
Maintain consistent temperature to ensure seal integrity.
Monitor foil alignment to prevent wastage and poor sealing.
Ensure products are dry and free from dust before packing.
